name: Thunder II
help:
Deals lightning damage with a potency of 30 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Lightning damage over time
Potency: 30
Duration: 12s Additional Effect: 3% chance after each tick that the next Thunder spell of any grade will add its full damage over time amount to its initial damage, have no cast time, and cost no MP
Duration: 18s Only one Thunder spell-induced damage over time effect per caster can be inflicted upon a single target.
